<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Thank you for that article. It certainly is proof of something I have observed over the last decade which is the buying of the left and distortion of politics by NGOs and ‘philanthropy’. The ‘left’ has become a front for these destructive agendas. I’m waiting for someone to freaking notice that the breakdown of our language and society in the service of ‘wokeness’ was hosted by these exact foundations who have their own interests that are in no way humanitarian but the opposite, serving the elite in atomizing the opposition. Ushering in the mass mental breakdown so we can all be saved by transhumanism and technocracy. You won’t own shit, but who cares you get to choose from hundreds of pre-approved labels and identities and be brave and stunning at all times. You even get your own flag, and we all know how important that is.</p>
<p> Shame on all of the nonprofits who sold out to lap at the trough and collect 6 figure wages. You are not revolutionaries, you are traitors to humanity.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-avatar">
<img alt="George Mc" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" decoding="async" height="64" loading="lazy" src="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/5fdd943d9ddc48d0d81f2f9071aee6d4?s=64&amp;d=monsterid&amp;r=pg" srcset="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/5fdd943d9ddc48d0d81f2f9071aee6d4?s=128&amp;d=monsterid&amp;r=pg 2x" width="64"/>

<div class="wpd-comment-right" id="comment-442424">
<div class="wpd-comment-header">
<div class="wpd-comment-author">
George Mc
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-date" title="Oct 21, 2021 11:00 AM">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="far fa-clock"></i>
Oct 21, 2021 11:00 AM
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-share wpd-hidden wpd-tooltip wpd-top">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-share-alt"></i>
<div class="wpd-tooltip-content">
<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=I was watching Cloverfield last night ... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F20%2Fwhat-is-the-global-public-private-partnership%2F%23comment-442424" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442424"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>I was watching <em>Cloverfield</em> last night (whilst trying hard not to throw up at the jittery hand held camera footage). This is a “monster invades New York” feature and I noticed the bit where a building collapses, a vast dust tsunami approaches and the camera man rushes into a shop to film the dust blotting out the street from the safety of the interior. </p>
<p>That was a familiar moment and I realised where I’d seen it before. There was a 9/11 amateur movie with someone filming a collapse, the dust approaching and the filmer being whisked into a shop. The street outside blackens and we get the filmer’s voice, “Oh my God! You saved my life!” </p>
<p>I wondered if the monster movie was filmed before 9/11 but I see it dates from 2008. The resemblance is so marked that I think it must have been inspired by the 9/11 film. But this is one of those cases where fact and fiction seem to blend in too easily. Perhaps I’m getting paranoid now but I wonder if that original 9/11 footage was shown by a couple of moles planted there to act out this little “heroic saviour” scene?</p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">

</div>
<div class="wpd-vote-result wpd-vote-result-like" title="0">0</div><div class="wpd-vote-result-sep"></div><div class="wpd-vote-result wpd-vote-result-dislike" title="0">0</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>I’d say you are correct, there were many strangely and perfectly timed videos captured that day, and then the monster movie director and studio reinforcing the official version of events, repeat and embed trauma – you’ve only got to scan Netflix and Now TV these days to see they’ve now gone full tilt – it’s all so obvious and banal, an attempted cultural revolutionary coup along with the Covid cock tale, and yet so few I know can see it when it is as plain as the nose on your face.</p>

<div class="wpd-avatar">
<img alt="George Mc" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" decoding="async" height="64" loading="lazy" src="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/5fdd943d9ddc48d0d81f2f9071aee6d4?s=64&amp;d=monsterid&amp;r=pg" srcset="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/5fdd943d9ddc48d0d81f2f9071aee6d4?s=128&amp;d=monsterid&amp;r=pg 2x" width="64"/>

<div class="wpd-comment-right" id="comment-442418">
<div class="wpd-comment-header">
<div class="wpd-comment-author">
George Mc
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-date" title="Oct 21, 2021 10:36 AM">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="far fa-clock"></i>
Oct 21, 2021 10:36 AM
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-share wpd-hidden wpd-tooltip wpd-top">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-share-alt"></i>
<div class="wpd-tooltip-content">
<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Spoiler Alert! If you haven’t seen Squ... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F20%2Fwhat-is-the-global-public-private-partnership%2F%23comment-442418" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442418"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p><strong><em>Spoiler Alert! If you haven’t seen Squid Game but intend to then it’s probably best if you don’t read this first. </em></strong></p>
<p>Squid Game features a brutal games tournament in which the contestants who fail to win are shot dead. There turns out to be only one winner who wins a vast amount of dosh. These games are watched by a small group of fabulously wealthy parasites. </p>
<p>The winner, after leaving the game, is about to board a plane when he decides to turn round because he intends to expose the whole rotten games set up.</p>
<p>Now here’s the problem: Does this winner really think that merely reporting this game show to the authorities will achieve anything? Doesn’t he realise that these fabulously wealthy are themselves effectively the owners of the very forces he wishes to “enlighten”? His alternative is to get the message out to the masses. But how does he do that? The parasites own the media too. His only option is to somehow create a clandestine network through which to relay information to the masses and generate within them a general anger and mistrust of the society around them so that some kind of mass protest can start.</p>
<p>How does this relate to our situation here in the covidised West? Well I recall a ludicrous statement from David Ray Griffin to the effect that he wanted an impartial international court to review the events of 9/11. And where did he expect to find such a court? No, the solution to the 9/11 bullshit, as also to the covid bullshit, is to establish networks of information that bypass the wretched controlled media and build up a resistance that way.</p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">

</div>
<div class="wpd-vote-result wpd-vote-result-like" title="0">0</div><div class="wpd-vote-result-sep"></div><div class="wpd-vote-result wpd-vote-result-dislike" title="0">0</div>

</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>👍</p>
<p>Dietrich Bonnhoeffer came to the same conclusion when he failed to convince the German sheeple that Nazism was leading them to the slaughter. An estimated 4-10 Million Gentile Germans died because of a character defect he called “stupidity” but which needs a better word to describe the bland, blinkered conformism that acts as a sort of force multiplier for evil. He saw it then, and we are seeing it now. </p>
<p>“Apart from his theological writings, <em>Bonhoeffer</em> was known for his staunch resistance to the Nazi dictatorship, including vocal opposition to Hitler’s euthanasia program”. — Wikipedia</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Re:</p>
<p>Now here’s the problem: Does this winner really think that merely reporting this game show to the authorities will achieve anything? Doesn’t he realise that these fabulously wealthy are themselves effectively the owners of the very forces he wishes to “enlighten”? His alternative is to get the message out to the masses. But how does he do that? The parasites own the media too. His only option is to somehow create a clandestine network through which to relay information to the masses and generate within them a general anger and mistrust of the society around them so that some kind of mass protest can start. . . . The solution . . . is to establish networks of information that bypass the wretched controlled media and build up a resistance that way.<br/>
—</p>
<p>?</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>You got me thinking, George. Sadly, decent films don’t ever seem to be shown on prime time TV these days (no doubt because of the popularity of pay to view channels), but I would love it if the iconic 1975 James Caan film “Rollerball” was shown. I just reminded myself of the film plot (far too complicated to summarise here) and there are amazing allegorical parallels to be drawn between it and what we are currently living through. For that reason alone, it will never be shown again. Having said that, I doubt that most of the viewing public would be cognisant enough to see the similarities.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-share wpd-hidden wpd-tooltip wpd-top">

<div class="wpd-tooltip-content">
<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=‘Squid Game’ is a good exa... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F20%2Fwhat-is-the-global-public-private-partnership%2F%23comment-442526" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442526"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-reply-to">
<i class="far fa-comments"></i>
Reply to 
<a href="#comment-442418">
George Mc
</a>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>‘Squid Game’ is a good example of the fake dialectic in play. Leftists are made to think it’s a critique of capitalism and the inevitable commodification of everything. In a way it is, but… it’s on Netflix. Do mega-rich corporations really broadcast critiques of capitalism? Of course not! It’s the elite showing how the system works and rubbing our faces in it. There’s even a reference to the BIS and the indebtedness of the Korean middle class. It shows indebtedness is the foundation of the power pyramid. Its main message is to show how game-ification is going to be increasingly the method of control (something to his credit Corbett identified some time ago).</p>
<p>The show was marketed by ‘concern journalism’. Don’t let your kids watch this show! Well, what will make kids watch it more? And it meant many people had heard of the show…</p>
<p>As usual there was esoteric symbolism. There was the usual checkerboard floor – are any other floorings available? Perhaps this was more a reference to the grand chessboard than freemasonic duality? Well, how about the geometric forms that constituted winning the game? A square with a triangle on top and a circle on top of that. The square is the world in freemasonic symbolism (representing the four cardinal poiints), the triangle is the power structure and the circle the all-seeing eye.</p>
<p>Review here:<br/>
<span class="embed-youtube" style="text-align:center; display: block;"><iframe allowfullscreen="true" class="youtube-player" height="360" sandbox="allow-scripts allow-same-origin allow-popups allow-presentation" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/20nigThMKI0?version=3&amp;rel=1&amp;showsearch=0&amp;showinfo=1&amp;iv_load_policy=1&amp;fs=1&amp;hl=en-US&amp;autohide=2&amp;wmode=transparent" style="border:0;" width="640"></iframe></span></p>
</div>

</div>

<p>Well sure – it only stands to reason that anything marketed on mainstream media will never be a threat to it. And Squid Game ends with that little “ray of hope” where the implication is that this winner is going to expose the bastards. It was like that ridiculous Years and Years thing by Russell T Davies where a dystopian future world gets “put right” by a load of wokers using their smart phones and iPads etc.</p>

<p>As it happened I was asked that question (by a sheep) just the other day – I simply replied:</p>
<p>“I fuck sheep.”</p>
<p>And by the look on sheep’s face I did – well and truly.</p>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>The only way to fight nonsense is to embrace it.</p>
<p>“What: are you a selfish anti-vaxxer?”</p>
<p>To which you proudly answer: “Absolutely. I care nothing about anyone else but me. I wouldn’t spit on you if you were dying of thirst. Does that answer your question?”</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Yes indeed, one of the hardest facts for some to swallow is that of the <code>deceiver</code> and his/her/its existence.<br/>
Regardless of the <code>humanistic</code> personifications/idealisations we give to <code>Good</code> and <code>evil</code>, the fact is folks that BOTH are hard at work.<br/>
Awareness of our current predicament is meaningless unless one chooses a side…<br/>
Here in good ol u of k where evil personified are entertained to tea n crumpets by our so called <code>leader</code>, “things” you could say are coming to a head.<br/>
Do you have a <code>plan b</code>? nah fuck that im sticking with the ORIGINAL script, albeit not the one the vatican fucked with.<br/>
Keep well folks, wherever you may be, you were meant to be here, now</p>
</div>

<p>I no longer believe that. They are scared. Probably with good reason – more political heads of state in opposition to the new normal have died in the last 18 months than is seemly. RIP Magufuli, Amess etc.</p>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Apparantly, you’re a fascist if you protest against being given a deadly injection:</p>
<p><a href="https://www.wsws.org/en/articles/2021/10/20/ital-o20.html" rel="nofollow ugc">https://www.wsws.org/en/articles/2021/10/20/ital-o20.html</a></p>
<p>Last time I looked, fascism is where you’re told what to do, where to go and how to think by a handful of ‘better’ people. Just like ‘democracy’, but without the fake elections. It appears the socialists now believe that giving people the choice between death by starvation and death by jab is how it should be. So, just another dictatorship then.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442753"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-reply-to">
<i class="far fa-comments"></i>
Reply to 
<a href="#comment-442464">
Gezzah Potts
</a>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>They are shuffling around Brisbane in full NPC mode, scanning QR codes to get into pet shops, Auto shops, bakeries. They are masked. I don’t get out much anymore so I don’t see them much. Had to go to the bank and it was a sad, sad state of affairs. Here I was thinking and hoping, geez maybe I’ll see some independent thought out there…some people without masks, some people not stopping and fumbling out their phone at the entrance to shops. Nope. Well, there was one other customer in the bank and he had no mask on like me. So that was good. But for some reason the pencil neck behind the counter asked me if I’d like a mask…but didn’t ask the other guy.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>I assume the WSW method of counting “anti-fascist” protesters is similar to the method of counting covid deaths e.g. Anyone who protests within 28 days of wearing a mask.</p>
<p>And – what a surprise! – Donald Trump’s storm trooping “crushing of skulls” at the Capitol gets a mention again. Well why not! <strong><em>Lights! Camera! Action!</em></strong><br/>
<strong><em>﻿</em></strong><br/>
And an Evil Fascist Nazi Far Far Far Right Thuggy Wuggy shouted, “Let’s go and get everything that is ours.” … umm …Isn’t that what revolutionaries are supposed to shout? </p>
<p>And of course, it being Italy, Mussolini gets trotted out! Good one, WSW! History lesson for the proles! Finger on the pulse!</p>
<p>And what’s this? A bit of having it both ways? “…the bankruptcy of the official “left” parties and trade unions…”. Interesting. And where are the “real Left” in all this?</p>
<p>And of course, “the entire Italian political establishment …has declared that there would be “no more lockdowns” as part of its drive to reopen the economy and ensure that corporate profits would continue, regardless on the spread of the virus and ensuing deaths”.</p>
<p>Just like the political establishments everywhere, eh? So desperate to cover up covid! I mean it’s not as if any of these corporate bastards are actually making money out of covid, is it? I mean it’s not as if e.g. covid was a <strong><em>“blessing for Bezos and a nightmare for workers” </em></strong>because <strong><em>“Bezos’ personal net worth has skyrocketed to $192 billion” </em></strong>or that there has been an <strong><em>“engorging of the super-rich on a massive run-up in share values, driven by a massive government bailout”.</em></strong> But who am I quoting here? Why – <strong><em>it’s the WSW themselves! </em></strong></p>
<p><a href="https://www.wsws.org/en/articles/2020/08/10/amaz-a10.html" rel="nofollow ugc">https://www.wsws.org/en/articles/2020/08/10/amaz-a10.html</a></p>
<p>Hey – but look! This nauseating WSW shit was evacuated out three days ago – and the number of comments so far? <strong><em>ZERO!</em></strong></p>
<p>The little devil in me feels an urge to insert a comment. Something like this:</p>
<p>“I’m giving you a comment WSW because I reckon you could do with one. (Sound of tumbleweeds through the empty streets!)”</p>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>“Tshirt or a flyer/posters in your community wil do more awareness”</p>
<p>This is very true, and it’s about the only way forward if you’re unwilling to fight in any real way. You must get the truth across to as many people as possible. Write it everywhere, wear it on your clothes, post it in your windows, shove it down their throats. Because without it you’re facing vax or no food, as at least 2 places in the world now have. Not forgetting the countless millions who’ve already been forced to poison themselves in order to get money to survive.</p>
<p>Shouting abuse at the other side a la icke is just driving a wedge between you and the only people on earth that might help you.</p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">
<div class="wpd-vote">
<div class="wpd-vote-up wpd_not_clicked">

</div>
<div class="wpd-vote-result wpd-vote-result-like" title="0">0</div><div class="wpd-vote-result-sep"></div><div class="wpd-vote-result wpd-vote-result-dislike" title="0">0</div>

</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Collapse of global supply chains is imminent. <a href="https://yvymaraey.blogspot.com/2021/10/alert-collapse-of-global-supply-chains.html" rel="nofollow ugc">https://yvymaraey.blogspot.com/2021/10/alert-collapse-of-global-supply-chains.html</a></p>
<p>” They planned from the beginning to use Covid to achieve a “global reset” that involved the destruction of the world’s markets, the shattering of the global financial system and the realisation of a mass extinction (which is already underway).<br/>
“The next six months will see extreme shortages in food, energy, medical supplies and commercial parts.”</p>
<p>The writer says this is to create chaos, unrest as a pretext for further govt crackdowns.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Excellent and comprehensive article Iain, thanks. And this has all been planned for a very long time, has it not? Just who is Klaus Schwab, and who is he doing the bidding for? Feel free to disagree with me, but my feeling is Schwab is more of a front person for more powerful figures.<br/>
I haven’t voted for over 25 years now, because I woke up to the charade of what “democratic elections” were, and who, in fact, the politicians were really working for, as you alude to here.<br/>
And, for absolute proof of this, you only need review the last 18 months, and look at the actions and words of creatures like Daniel Andrews, Justin Trudeau, Boris Johnstone, Jacinda Ardern and all the other chinless yes men and women.<br/>
Because they are all clearly working together towards ushering in a Technocratic biomedical dystopia.<br/>
<a href="https://www.globalresearch.ca/10-current-trends-operation-coronavirus-october-2021/5759155" rel="nofollow ugc">https://www.globalresearch.ca/10-current-trends-operation-coronavirus-october-2021/5759155</a></p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p><a href="https://www.tga.gov.au/periodic/covid-19-vaccine-weekly-safety-report-21-10-2021" rel="nofollow ugc">https://www.tga.gov.au/periodic/covid-19-vaccine-weekly-safety-report-21-10-2021</a> And now the TGA finally admit hundreds have actually died from the jabs after NSW started to report they died from the jabs, Victoria finally announces the same by simply stating 12 or so died, not that they died of covid. In NZ three times more have died from the jabs, 50 have had major strokes yet no pandemic ever bothered Australia or NZ except our love affair with Gates.</p>
<p>I wonder how many more teenagers and children will have to be crippled or even die before they stop this crap.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>I’ve said before that Klaus Schwab may well be another “psy-op” element. Not that I think he’s fake. But, as others have noted, he’s practically the embodiment of the clichéd Bond/Superman villain – Blofeld or Lex Luther … or, perhaps even more to the point, Austin Power’s Dr Evil. Thus this Big Baddie is a figure of fun to be ridiculed. Hence Schwab. And the beauty is that Schwab can indeed “spill the beans” with perfect honesty knowing that this blueprint for world domination can easily be rejected as “silly conspiracy stuff” – not least by our Left gatekeepers who can be relied upon to spout off about the correct approach. </p>
<p>Thus your Oz mag Redflag: </p>
<p>“Without a coherent understanding of the dynamics of capitalism… concerns … have evolved into conspiracy theory quackery.”</p>
<p>And the Western populace have been “educated” into dismissing “silly stuff” like Karl Blofeld Luther Evil.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>For me, I believe Schwab is more a front person, the public talking head if you will. And as I said elsewhere, the truly vile Socialist Alternative are keeping the flock from straying.<br/>
Imagine someone waking up and realising what’s going on, and then seeing anti lockdown groups repeatedly labelled as far right white supremacists, with Qanon dropped into the article several times.<br/>
Will that person be then likely to go off and join one of these “far right groups”? I don’t think so.<br/>
They were also fully on board the MSM narrative on Syria as well, and waxed lyrical about jihadist headchoppers as “revolutionaries”.</p>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>I’m afraid I have to agree with you. My oldest friend of 55 years is a lovely guy but hasn’t a clue about the news and the media. When the MSM want to demonise someone my friend will cheerfully chime in with, “Ooh he was a bad ‘un!” He was also sadly gullible with the old MeToo evidence-free smear campaign. And he casually mentioned in passing the distressing matter of Jeremy Corbyn’s “racism”. Another old friend talked about the “transgender” crud by saying that there were trans people going all the way back through history “but no-one understood it back then” – exactly the meme circulating in the MSM. </p>
<p>(I wonder how far you could push this? How about drumming up passion over people with an erotic fixation over hedgehogs? Call them Trans-hog. Then say that these persecuted individuals have always been with us. I’m sure you could stir up the desired sentiment in a month or two.)    </p>
<p>After which, the sudden lockstep of the media’s “war on covid” with that showbiz Left branch fully on board would seem straightforward.</p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">

</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Agree completely about Mr Schwab. </p>
<p>If you want your front man to scare people, you put a little mustache on him, give him a swastika and have him shriek into a microphone.</p>
<p>But if you want your front man to lull people into a kind of trance, you give him a Conehead, a soft voice and a silly outfit that no one could possibly see as menacing.</p>
</div>

<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442588"></i></span>

Reply to 
<a href="#comment-442427">
Gezzah Potts
</a>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p><em>I believe Schwab is more a front person, the public talking head</em><br/>
__________________________________</p>
<p>This may well be the case. If so, I can only assume that the powers and principalities that designated or appointed Schwab didn’t bother doing any “marketing studies”, e.g. focus-group testing.</p>
<p>I suppose that there is a minuscule target demographic of elderly individuals or communities who respond positively to Schwab’s face and demeanor. </p>
<p>But it’s hard to believe that the vast majority of humans who see Schwab’s face, demeanor, and Darth Vaderesque garb aren’t instantly viscerally repelled. His grim physiognomy screams “Run, don’t walk, away!” </p>
<p>I suppose apologists, if any, insist that he has a grandfatherly or avuncular appeal: mature, wise, and reassuring. But to me, he’s the antithesis of “charismatic”.</p>
<p>All that said, perhaps it’s just as well that they didn’t recruit some handsome, superficially glamorous Hollywood type who might fool Useful Idiots into sycophantic submission.</p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">

</div>

Reply to 
<a href="#comment-442588">
Ort

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>I greatly doubt the vast majority of covid cult members even know Klaus Schwab exists, or looks like, and have never heard about The Great Reset, let alone the Internet of Things (us)<br/>
Hell, they think the vaccines are normal ordinary vaccines, or at least the people I spoke to about them did.<br/>
A lot of people out there are completely distracted by fluff and trinkets and other things and they have their own lives to lead juggling jobs and mortgage payments and feeding families. And they don’t usually wake up one day and go “I need to do some independent research on The Great Reset or the intended global digital currency”.<br/>
How are things going in Philadelphia at present? Are there still restrictions there? For what it’s worth, I think the United States will be a very very tough nut to crack, and there will be large parts of your country that will never get jabbed.<br/>
And the big problem for the Cabal is there are a helluva lot of guns there. The one thing I am concerned about is the many many ships off mainly the West Coast being refused to unload their cargo.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-right" id="comment-442354">
<div class="wpd-comment-header">
<div class="wpd-comment-author">
WorkingClassHero
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-date" title="Oct 21, 2021 7:02 AM">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="far fa-clock"></i>
Oct 21, 2021 7:02 AM
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-share wpd-hidden wpd-tooltip wpd-top">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-share-alt"></i>
<div class="wpd-tooltip-content">
<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Compensation in Australia for the R... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F20%2Fwhat-is-the-global-public-private-partnership%2F%23comment-442354" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442354"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Compensation in Australia for the “safe injections”.</p>
<p>So we started off with “the injections have zero side effects”.<br/>
This was soon changed to “there are a few side effects”.<br/>
Then it was “of course there are side effects, nothing is 100% safe”.<br/>
Then it was “Side effects are rare”.<br/>
Now it’s “will will give you 5/20k if you suffer serious adverse reactions”. </p>
<p><a href="https://www.health.gov.au/initiatives-and-programs/covid-19-vaccine-claims-scheme" rel="nofollow ugc">https://www.health.gov.au/initiatives-and-programs/covid-19-vaccine-claims-scheme</a></p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">

<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Australian Health Department as per WC... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F20%2Fwhat-is-the-global-public-private-partnership%2F%23comment-442430" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>

<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442430"></i></span>
</div>

<div class="wpd-reply-to">
<i class="far fa-comments"></i>
Reply to 
<a href="#comment-442354">
WorkingClassHero
</a>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Australian Health Department as per WCH’s link provided:</p>
<p>“The Therapeutic Goods Administration (TGA) closely monitor adverse events for suspected side effects, and often find they are not caused by the vaccine itself.”</p>
<p>Note: “closely monitor” – does not mean medically investigate and only relates to reported adverse events. Most adverse events and an unknown number deaths are not being reported by the hospitals according to anecdotal sources – this seems to be the case all over the world. </p>
<p>TGA as per Marylin’s link:</p>
<p>“The TGA reviews all deaths reported in people who have been vaccinated. As the number of vaccinated people has increased, so has reporting of fatal events with a coincidental association with vaccination. This does not indicate a link between vaccination and the fatalities reported. Review of individual reports and patterns of reporting does not suggest the vaccines played a role in these deaths.”</p>
<p>Note: “Review of individual reports and patterns of reporting” does not mean medical investigation.</p>
<p>The TGA’s <span class="ql-font-serif">Risk Assessment and Risk Management Plan</span> (RARMP) states that they will apply the Proportional Risk Ratio (PRR) method to investigate adverse events and deaths. This is a statistical investigation not a medical investigation. One would expect, taking into account that these vaccines were poorly tested, all serious adverse events would be medically investigated so as to gather critical data in relation to vaccine safety – no such thing was planned because the TGA’s considered these vaccines had negligible risk to start with. </p>
<p>After reading the RARMP’s three thoughts came to mind:</p>
<p>Willful ignorance</p>
<p>Criminal negligence</p>
<p>God help us all</p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">

</div>

Oct 21, 2021 8:25 PM
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-share wpd-hidden wpd-tooltip wpd-top">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-share-alt"></i>
<div class="wpd-tooltip-content">
<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=When you compare the AusVaxSafety (sol... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F20%2Fwhat-is-the-global-public-private-partnership%2F%23comment-442567" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442567"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-reply-to">
<i class="far fa-comments"></i>
Reply to 
<a href="#comment-442432">
Marilyn Shepherd
</a>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>When you compare the AusVaxSafety (solicited) reports with the TGA (passive) reports it is clear that the TGA receives way less than 1% of adverse reactions. It is also notable that AusVaxSafety reports 0.9% of vaccine recipients end up seeking medical attention at a GP or a hospital. So far Australia has conducted 33,489,485 vaccinations which equates to over 300,000 people seeking medical attention. AusVaxSafety do not show how many died or were hospitalised as far as I can see. It’s no wonder many nurses do not want to get vaxxed – they see first hand what our media refuse to report. Never before have nearly one in a hundred people sought medical attention after a vaccine.</p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">

</div>

<i class="far fa-comments"></i>
Reply to 
<a href="#comment-442367">
ImpObs
</a>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>more like bricks, with machine guns mounted at the top, with electrified, razor and barbed wire, jackbooted and armed thugs, and a clear view of the sick psychopaths laughing at us from the luxury towers in the far distance…seems a little like sitting on a deck chair from a good view point, and having a picnic, enjoying the the vista as artillery, heavy ordinance and phosphorous is dropped on Palestinians…funny that.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-right" id="comment-442352">
<div class="wpd-comment-header">
<div class="wpd-comment-author">
NoThanks
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-date" title="Oct 21, 2021 6:36 AM">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="far fa-clock"></i>
Oct 21, 2021 6:36 AM
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-share wpd-hidden wpd-tooltip wpd-top">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-share-alt"></i>
<div class="wpd-tooltip-content">
<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=When trying to convince friends that a... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F20%2Fwhat-is-the-global-public-private-partnership%2F%23comment-442352" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442352"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p><span>When trying to convince friends that all of this is actually happening, it’s unsurprisingly a lot for them to accept. It’s much easier to view me as a crazy person than deal with the possibility that I’m right. The one point I make to them which seems to gain the most traction is the following:</span></p>
<p><span>We are reaching the age </span><a href="https://www.technologyreview.com/2021/05/27/1025453/artificial-intelligence-learning-create-itself-agi/" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">when artificial intelligence can create its own artificial intelligence</a><span>. When computers can not only solve problems conjured by humans, but analyze situations and discover problems to solve on their own without the need for humans, the existing paradigm of working for an income falls apart. The bulk of the workforce—both blue collar and white collar—becomes expendable. This is an inevitability with unconstrained technological advancement, and the network of corporate and political leaders (discussed in this article) have been meeting and brainstorming on how to get from the old paradigm to the new one for ages. </span></p>
<p><span>Of course we’re witnessing the controlled demolition of one world and the rebuilding of a new one. Quite frankly, why would this NOT be happening? This is the price of believing that all technological pursuits are worthwhile. We always ask “can we build these technologies?” and fail to ask “should we build these technologies?” </span></p>
</div>

</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-left">
<div class="wpd-avatar">
<img alt="Edwige" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" decoding="async" height="64" loading="lazy" src="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/1cd7687c46560cb04a7a78c9b9f4502c?s=64&amp;d=monsterid&amp;r=pg" srcset="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/1cd7687c46560cb04a7a78c9b9f4502c?s=128&amp;d=monsterid&amp;r=pg 2x" width="64"/>

<div class="wpd-comment-right" id="comment-442408">
<div class="wpd-comment-header">
<div class="wpd-comment-author">
Edwige
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-date" title="Oct 21, 2021 10:09 AM">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="far fa-clock"></i>
Oct 21, 2021 10:09 AM
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-share wpd-hidden wpd-tooltip wpd-top">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-share-alt"></i>
<div class="wpd-tooltip-content">
<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=I had another attempt at convincing tw... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F20%2Fwhat-is-the-global-public-private-partnership%2F%23comment-442408" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442408"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-reply-to">
<i class="far fa-comments"></i>
Reply to 
<a href="#comment-442352">
NoThanks
</a>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>I had another attempt at convincing two normie friends recently. I picked CBDCs as this seemed the strngest ground to go on. They’re BBC watchers so it shows what they’ve been primed with on this topic.</p>
<p>Firstly, they hadn’t thought of the surveillance angle at all and perceived the issue entirely in terms of convenience. Then surveillance was perceived as a good thing because if the government knew every financial transaction they could “clamp down on drug dealers”. Pointing out that every one of their own financial transactions would be known for evermore made one look a bit nervous but still they wouldn’t relent. When I pointed out the progammable capabilities of CBDC I was told “they’d never do that”. I was told a non-CBDC alternative would have to be available. Finally, I learnt that they were probably tracking everything already and it wouldn’t really make much difference anyway. During the discussion on programmability there was a long digression on how they could control what their children spent money on and when. My argument that we (all in our 50s) aren’t children was met by blank looks then a changing of the subject.</p>
<p>I mention this because it might help others prepare for the programmed responses you might meet. Looking back, I was too certain that if I could convince them about surveillance everything else would fall into place. Most normies aren’t bothered about surveillance, “they’ve done nothing wrong and have nothing to fear”. It happens to other people in other places. Surveillance means the door being kicked in and they’ve never experienced that nor fear it. The genius of this dictatorship is that it’s cloaked. Surveillance now is mostly now about learning how to manipulate us better, learning what we value and above all what we fear. The problem here is pointing how this out hits most people’s egos, the conviction that they are too clever to be manipulated. Of course admitting that we have been and still are manipulated helps a little but it’s too bitter a pill for many.</p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">
<div class="wpd-vote">

</div>

<p>Interesting they must be playing the oh but one is already under surveillance lime as I met it today too….oh you silly people you are already there….little do these people understand the social credit system is somewhat different and some unknown stranger will be deciding their fate and if they violate whatever and I suspect drug dealing may be the least of their worries….what, where and quantities of eating is a problem coming to a few of them sooner and they had no idea…</p>

<div class="wpd-comment-share wpd-hidden wpd-tooltip wpd-top">

<div class="wpd-tooltip-content">
<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=I don’t know, Edith.   As Edwige... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F20%2Fwhat-is-the-global-public-private-partnership%2F%23comment-442438" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>

<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442438"></i></span>
</div>

<div class="wpd-reply-to">
<i class="far fa-comments"></i>
Reply to 
<a href="#comment-442413">
Edith
</a>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>I don’t know, Edith. As Edwige alluded to, and as I have thought about recently – most people, especially under the age of 50, will not be bothered by the digital everything. Certainly everyone under 30 has been born into it.</p>
<p>I think most people will look on it as another convenience. Or they just won’t look at it at all. It will happen and they will go along automatically.</p>
<p>I will bet that most of the people that think nothing of the coming invasion won’t be affected by social credit score because they are the kind of people that conform. They pay their taxes, they pay their traffic tickets, they don’t step out of line.</p>
<p>Here’s a little anecdotal story about the eventual digital currency.</p>
<p>I live in a medium sized, upper middle class town. The local grocery mart replaced the two “Express lines – under 12 items” with 4 do-it-yourself- checkout machines, which I abhor. The caveat being you can only use the do-it-yourself checkout with a credit/debit card. No cash.</p>
<p>So if you have two items and you want to pay cash, you are reduced to standing in line behind a woman shopping for a family of four.</p>
<p>(OK, you could argue that patience is called for, but I say patience be damned)</p>
<p>And of course we have the stadiums where you cannot purchase tickets with cash anymore. You cannot buy a beer and pretzel with cash.</p>
<p>I do wonder what the underground economy will be.</p>
<p>Any guesses?</p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">

<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442664"></i></span>

<div class="wpd-reply-to">
<i class="far fa-comments"></i>
Reply to 
<a href="#comment-442408">
Edwige
</a>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>I have started writing here, although I was initially conscious that the data from posts would be scanned/used/recorded. Now that they clearly don’t care which lines they cross or lies they tell, I feel less shy. I believe in science and medicine – and the way it is being done is outrageous. This can be proven. If they make it such that I have no recourse in law, they end law and order – I don’t really believe they want to do that. They – and who is ‘they’ currently is a good question – it is certainly not governments – want us to believe. If we end law and order we will not.</p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">

</div>

<p>or 1947 when the Department of War became the Department of Defense. I think this is where Orwell got some of his ideas.</p>
</div>

<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442328"></i></span>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Actually it does matter who we elect. Because those “we” are electing (those that vote) are the people who are causing us to be in this situation. So ya, it matters a lot. It’s fucking everything. We who are against this scamdemic and global reset can’t expect to continue to allow the scammers themselves to control our political systems. We have to take control from them. Last election in the U.S., two political parties organized people and ended up getting around 160 million people to vote for their politicians. They organized, they went out among the people and gave speeches, they raised millions (billions?) of dollars to get the word out so people would vote for THEIR politicians. I realize we’re up against it and have nowhere near the resources and wherewithal (at this point) that “they” do, but I think we’re fooling ourselves if we think we don’t have to fight for our voices to be heard, and counted, in our political systems, including efforts to change the systems. We have to be strong enough, collectively, to tell the globalists to fuck off. That’s not going to happen by magic.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p><strong>Alexander Boris de Pfeffel Johnson, always knew he was born for this…</strong></p>
<p>Alexander Boris de Pfeffel Johnson was born on 19 June 1964 on the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Upper_East_Side" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">Upper East Side</a> of <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Manhattan" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">Manhattan</a>, New York City</p>
<p>He was destined for this..</p>
<p>He probably compared himself to John Lennon (no can’t sing) John F Kennedy(No dead already) then Boris compared himself to Harold Wilson (no he hardly killed anyone, told The Americans to piss off) Edward Heath – don’t be silly, Boris prefers girls…Then their is Tony Blair(no not him Miranda prefers girls)</p>
<p>Chairman Mao – No he was Genocidal Murdering Lunatic financed and paid by New York, and <strong>Lev Davidovich Bronstein </strong>better known as <strong>Leon Trotsky and Joseph Vissarionovich Stalin and Genghis Khan</strong><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Genghis_Khan#cite_note-12" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">[note 4]</a> (c. 1158 – August 18, 1227), born <strong>Temüjin</strong>,<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Genghis_Khan#cite_note-Temujin-3" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">[note 1]</a> was the founder and first <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great_Khan" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">Great Khan</a> (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">Emperor</a>) of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mongol_Empire" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">Mongol Empire</a>…</p>
<p>Is Trying to Beat the Lot of Them with his Princess Nut Nuts</p>
<p>Boris is going for The Big One</p>
<p>He is going for The Billions…</p>
<p>Just accept that your Government is doing their best to Kill You, and you might have a clue</p>
<p>Don’t Get Jabbed</p>
<p>Just Make Love with the person you love, and if you haven’t found them yet be quick, get out unmasked and unjabbed and try and meet – might be a college, uni or whatever, and work out if you can love and live with this person forever…and make babies together.</p>
<p>These Bastards are Trying to Kill Us.</p>
<p>Get used to it</p>
<p>PROTEST – or they will kill us all.</p>
<p>Tony</p>

<img alt="Tony_0pmoc" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" decoding="async" height="64" loading="lazy" src="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/8b4f30cc1ced855ea760d6f1fb78822e?s=64&amp;d=monsterid&amp;r=pg" srcset="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/8b4f30cc1ced855ea760d6f1fb78822e?s=128&amp;d=monsterid&amp;r=pg 2x" width="64"/>

<div class="wpd-comment-right" id="comment-442297">
<div class="wpd-comment-header">
<div class="wpd-comment-author">
Tony_0pmoc
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-date" title="Oct 21, 2021 1:38 AM">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="far fa-clock"></i>
Oct 21, 2021 1:38 AM
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-share wpd-hidden wpd-tooltip wpd-top">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-share-alt"></i>
<div class="wpd-tooltip-content">
<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=I can see all the COVID propaganda kic... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F20%2Fwhat-is-the-global-public-private-partnership%2F%23comment-442297" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442297"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>I can see all the COVID propaganda kicking in again,and our petrol driven chain saw, has given up the ghost, and has long been binned. It always scared the shit out of me, but I will ask my lad, if he thinks we should buy another one, another heavy duty battery another AC/DC converter and turn off all the electric power in our house, and test it by connecting it to our central heating pump. which drives the hot water around our house, powered by our gas boiler…or just order another 13 bags of smokeless coal</p>
<p>I have no intention of freezing to death. We have also got Grandchildren living in our house.</p>
<p>Got to get my wife back home, from Up North first.</p>
<p>She should be arriving later today, but you know what the trains are like..</p>
<p>Warned the previous day, there might be some delays…</p>
<p>And we were looking at the trains going Up North..all cancelled unil 11:30..</p>
<p>We were sat together looking at the traffic news, well like you do..</p>
<p>And we look at each other, as if we were 13 years old kids.</p>
<p>My wife is trying to get Up North to see her Mum…</p>
<p>How did British Rail or whatever they are called know, knew the day before that the trains from London Euston to Up North were going to be delayed until 11:30</p>
<p>I do accept that some people, just decide, they can’t take it any more, and they do stand in front of a train and get splattered to bits, and it makes a big mess, and the train drive is traumatised, tries to duck, and not look. Not another one – I’m going to throw up…</p>
<p>But most people do not phone British Rail up a Day in Advance – wel maybe Extension Rebellion and say I am going to stand in the way of your train…</p>
<p>Well maybe they do, and think the train is going to stop, when the train driver sees me.</p>
<p>I know a couple of train drivers, and have massive respect for them.</p>
<p>Stop Making a Mess.</p>
<p>The Train Can’t Stop That Fast. It doesn’t work like that.</p>
<p>Zoom – Splat -Dead – Mess all over the tracks</p>
<p>I know, I am not supposed to feel like this, texting my Ex, doesn’t really help, that much.</p>
<p>I just can’t wait to see my lovely wife again, later today.</p>
<p>I know she is going to tell me off, cos the house is a bit of a mess..</p>
<p>What did she expect – 4 boys together, playing scalectrix racing cars and hornby trains.</p>
<p>No girls involved.</p>
<p>Oh she’s back…..</p>
<p>(She knows we all love her to bits)</p>
<p>Tony</p>
</div>

Please– you must understand how the obedience platform is to come about.</p>
<p><a href="https://www.lewrockwell.com/2021/10/no_author/vaxx-skullduggery-exposed/" rel="nofollow ugc">https://www.lewrockwell.com/2021/10/no_author/vaxx-skullduggery-exposed/</a></p>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>It means what They want it to mean and They mean it to mean compulsory – that’s why “mandated” is being used…<br/>
…and because They, in Australia, have never made it known the experimental injection is voluntary…<br/>
And you would have to search forever to find any advice by the government, or provided by the mass media, informing how you go about having any injuries caused by the experiment recorded. (Good chance whoever gave you the injection doesnt know how / where to record your injuries either.)</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442641"></i></span>

<div class="wpd-reply-to">
<i class="far fa-comments"></i>
Reply to 
<a href="#comment-442254">
shamen
</a>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Shamen, I know, I just wanted to send that message out-loud yesterday. I guess if I was them I would extend the state of emergency too so I am not surprised to find this today on their website:<br/>
‘<span>Extends the current Declaration of State of Emergency through to 11:59pm on 18 November 2021. Signed by Minister for Health, Martin Foley, MP.’</span></p>
<p>But, this kind of ‘surprises’ are not a novel confrontation to the senses so after enjoying my morning coffee I am ready to get on with another day. I am still alive and healthy and if they can keep going then why should I not. </p>
<p>I don’t know, I haven’t got any solution though I do know that mass noncompliance is the key to changing this fucked-up reality, but you know, I am not waiting to be ‘surprised’ by that either. But all in all my spirit is still strong and feeling happy (with intermittent bouts of despondence admittedly).</p>
<p>Saying that, I like this solution from Jon Rappoport:<br/>
<strong><em>‘The vaccine: A religious exemption for the whole world’ </em></strong><strong><em> </em></strong><a href="https://blog.nomorefakenews.com/2021/10/19/the-vaccine-a-religious-exemption-for-the-whole-world/" rel="nofollow ugc">https://blog.nomorefakenews.com/2021/10/19/the-vaccine-a-religious-exemption-for-the-whole-world/</a></p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Hunchback Danny Andrews is talking a very weird game. He is certain “the virus” will terrorise throughout 2022. That’s a lock. He said it. He knows it. Furthermore, he started with almost the same certainty that after that, variants would arise. Dead set. This guy and or his magic scientific staff and advisors are Gods. They see the future. They demonstrate incredible powers.</p>
</div>

<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=I admit, I am a little bit of a Preppe... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F20%2Fwhat-is-the-global-public-private-partnership%2F%23comment-442228" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442228"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>I admit, I am a little bit of a Prepper (not like an American Prepper (not quite that mad)) but pretty much the same on an English Level.</p>
<p>Our Son does have a Sailing Boat, and all our immediate family can fit in, and we can fish..got the gear and stuff..but where tf do we go, if it all kicks off again in England, like it did in 2010..but 10 times worse, and they try and burn London to the Ground, whilst they fire almost all our Firemen. Almost all our Gasmen. Almost All Our Policemen, Almost all our Sewarage Workers. most of our fruit pickers, most doctors and nurses who like me refuse to be jabbed…and the people who work in pubs, and almost all essential industry…</p>
<p>Trying to Crash Our Country ENGLAND</p>
<p>And we have got these Morons in Control, and Maybe a Good Guy a Westminster MP had hinted that he was going to tell the Truth, about what he knew</p>
<p>RIP David A Mess</p>
<p>He quite obvioulsy seriously pissed someone off, about what he was going to say</p>
<p>Now we have got another lockdown , mask wearing atrocity to look forward too..</p>
<p>Come one you must have seen the progression in The Daily Rags…so prepare as best you can for a very cold winter, when both the gas and electricity may go off, as well as essential services, like the delivery off food.</p>
<p>Fight Back. COMPLAIN</p>
<p>RESIST</p>
<p>These Monsters in Control have not given up yet.</p>
<p>Stock up, and buy a camping stove and gas bottles, before they run out, and candles and torches and stuff..so you can see what you are doing…and canned food even if its for the cat..</p>
<p>Do not expect any internet or any communication. just prepare to be Incredibly Cold, unless you have got a fireplace, and bought some smokeless coal, and have also got a chimney, and know how to light it.</p>
<p><a href="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2017/12/22/14/478482CB00000578-5205859-image-a-21_1513951348398.jpg" rel="noreferrer ugc nofollow" target="_blank"><img alt="comment image" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2017/12/22/14/478482CB00000578-5205859-image-a-21_1513951348398.jpg"/></a></p>
<p>DON’t Get Jabbed</p>
<p>Tony</p>
</div>

<i class="far fa-comments"></i>
Reply to 
<a href="#comment-442402">
jimbo
</a>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>No, this place is still the ‘real deal’, do not worry, much to the chagrin of some it seems lol. However, voting is a bit facebooky so we’re trialling it without for a bit. We didn’t feel it was worth a major announcement, as it’s a minor feature and would risk colouring the experiment by making it a ‘thing’. We’ll be making a decision in the upcoming weeks on the best way forward. Thanks for your feedback, A2</p>
</div>

<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442222"></i></span>

</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>The GPP is TPP re-badged for easier political acceptance.</p>
<p>TPP gave intermational corporations the unchallengeable right to profit, superceding any and all local rules and regulations.</p>
<p>TPP is corporate feudalism.</p>
</div>

<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Vaxxed thought their lives would retur... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F20%2Fwhat-is-the-global-public-private-partnership%2F%23comment-442221" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>

<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442221"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Vaxxed thought their lives would return to normal only to discover that being Vaxxed means nothing facing tyranny unleashed under Covid pretense.</p>
<p>From ABC</p>
<blockquote><p>Greece had lifted travel restrictions and this couple had all the [Vax and test] documents Greece requires. But the trip unraveled when they tried to connect to their flight in Switzerland. They were stopped at the gate and worse, the police came and arrested them..They booked a Swiss Air flight from San Francisco to Athens, with a connection in Zurich. It all went smoothly until that connection in Zurich..Swiss police said their gate technically was inside Switzerland… and Americans were banned from Switzerland because of COVID-19. They’d have to be deported – all the way back to California.</p></blockquote>
<p>Vaxxed discovered that Vax does not protect against infection and consequently and Vaxxed foreigners are treated as unvaxxed as far as contagion is concerned according to their logic.</p>
<p>Still many Vaxxed refuse to acknowledge that they signed up for madness and criminalization of social life along lines of Jim Crow laws.</p>
</div>

<p>7 million people in HK are now obediently masked and have been since late July 2020. That’s more than a year in the lives of people forced to wear masks everywhere but the private home. And they are OK with it. </p>
<p>2 years ago the HK Gov were the biggest villains in HK…never to be trusted…full of deception and evil. Now, the HK people obediently follow their every word. </p>
<p>Isn’t it amazing what a little health fear campaign can do to people?</p>

<div class="wpd-comment-left">
<div class="wpd-avatar">
<img alt="Rhisiart Gwilym" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" decoding="async" height="64" loading="lazy" src="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/66c4444d77a0f526f91ec69ebd4fc85e?s=64&amp;d=monsterid&amp;r=pg" srcset="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/66c4444d77a0f526f91ec69ebd4fc85e?s=128&amp;d=monsterid&amp;r=pg 2x" width="64"/>

<div class="wpd-comment-right" id="comment-442187">
<div class="wpd-comment-header">
<div class="wpd-comment-author">
Rhisiart Gwilym
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-date" title="Oct 20, 2021 8:26 PM">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="far fa-clock"></i>
Oct 20, 2021 8:26 PM
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-share wpd-hidden wpd-tooltip wpd-top">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-share-alt"></i>
<div class="wpd-tooltip-content">
<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Excellent piece, Iain. However, with o... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F20%2Fwhat-is-the-global-public-private-partnership%2F%23comment-442187" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442187"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Excellent piece, Iain. However, with one glaring error. Speaking of ‘The Limits To Growth’:</p>
<p>“<span>So far, none of the predictions made have come to pass.</span>”</p>
<p>On the contrary, ‘TLTG’ and ‘TLTG – The Thirty-Year Update’ have proven themselves since the publication of the first report in 1972 to be probably the most reliable projection available of what is actually happening, up to now. </p>
<p>It’s important to distinguish between the Meadows team who produced the report, and the sponsor, the Club of Rome, which was and is one of the ‘stakeholder’ bunches of crooks whom you quite rightly excoriate. Dennis Meadows and his colleagues, otoh, were still able to operate at that time as honest scientists, and they did so. Btw, it was Donella Meadows who actually wrote the original book, from the team’s accumulated conclusions.</p>
<p><em>It needs to be seen with the starkest clarity that the villainies which the ‘stakeholder’ – execrable coinage! – gangs are attempting to foist on us are quite separate from the geo-eco-physical processes which are happening to us quite independently of ANY attempted manipulations by ANY groups of humans</em>; and which will, for example, have pretty well cured spontaneously our current population-overshoot episode by – most probably – the end of this century, or sometime in the first half of the next. The eugenicist crooks can go fuck themselves, because the reduction, as it occurs, will take zero account of their selective-breeding wet dreams. The usual impersonal evolutionary processes will take all that out of our hands, as the overshoot corrects automatically.</p>
<p>Clearly, collectively-ultra-feckless humankind aren’t going to do anything effective about this, any more than we’ll do anything effective about climate shift – even if we still could, which is highly questionable by now, beyond just alleviating the worst effects a little. Yet these crises will be resolved, by the Earth doing what it always does in these circumstances, and a new balance will be struck; as has happened often before, reaching back into the remote past of the planet.</p>
<p>I applaud your insightful laying bare of the coteries of crooks who make up the conspirators behind the covid swindle. It was always obvious that some such network of criminals was pushing it: so clearly coordinated throughout – at least – the Anglozionist empire and its dependencies as it is; and with the vast propaganda blizzard, also obviously coordinated, that’s pushing it. Your map makes clear just how it’s done – completely outwith any pretence of democratic advice and consent. Kudos in spades for that, Iain. But do get your understanding straight about ‘TLTG’. That actually has very little to do with the maunderings of the neo-feudalist criminals trying right now to stampede us all into the bum’s rush.</p>
<p>Here’s a recent (2014) vid of Dennis Meadows speaking to a German audience about ‘TLTG’. This gives a soberer picture of its relevance, beneath the acres of arrant bullshit under which the world’s massed bullshitters have attempted to bury it:</p>
<p><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uYNlhjOZ7DU&amp;ab_channel=VolkswagenStiftung" rel="nofollow ugc">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uYNlhjOZ7DU&amp;ab_channel=VolkswagenStiftung</a></p>
<p>Note in particular Dennis’s remarks about the essential necessity of taking a long view of history, from about 46 minutes on. All the commentators who seem to me to have things right about the – inexorably-real – limits to growth always come from that perspective. It’s a great clearer-away of airy-fairy fashionable memes-of-the-moment, of zero depth and zero predictive power…</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>An excellent post, highlighting the one point of this article that I disagreed with. I think that Malthus gets a bad rep on this board, I happen to think that the Malthusian theory of population makes perfect sense and we cannot stop it from happening, given the nature of modern humans and the Western addiction to consumerism.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>After examining limits to growth at uni and then becoming an astrologer, I occasionally wondered how and when the planets would call a halt to human excess and actual disregard for what we do….and it looks like I am seeing just that but as always the pins are pulled by real humans who so often think they are in control but never really are…</p>
<p>the plan is unfolding nicely..interesting times. And no doubt getting to block chain and countries all having large debts have made it possible….alomg with. Most of the population being asleep at the wheel enjoying what they thought was their right to the bounty.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/#comment-442321"></i></span>

<div class="wpd-reply-to">
<i class="far fa-comments"></i>
Reply to 
<a href="#comment-442234">
Edith
</a>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>There is no debt. </p>
<p>All loans are predicated on the fact that the arranging bank for the alleged loan takes your application, which as soon as you sign it becomes a security with a credit value equal to the amount applied for.</p>
<p>This security is then used in the banking system to generate the credits applied for. This security is called a promissory note and belongs to the maker of the note which is you. The bank take your Promissory Note and sell it into the banking system to obtain your credits, that’s right your credits, and return these new credits to a transaction account before onward transmission to your “loan account”,</p>
<p>Modern Money Mechanics page 6. They also charge you interest on the credits which belong to you. Thieving bastards.</p>
<p>Repeat after me There is no debt.</p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">

</div>

Yet somehow many imagine humans have barely scratched the surface and have sufficient resources almost unto infinity.</p>

<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=And modern science has the incredible ... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F20%2Fwhat-is-the-global-public-private-partnership%2F%23comment-442444" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>

Reply to 
<a href="#comment-442255">
Howard
</a>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>And modern science has the incredible ability to conjure a magic injection in 2 seconds flat…but needs to have a stranger stick 6 inches of plastic deep down your nose to scrape and pry and fish out tissue while you sit in your car to run tests on. Something’s not right. Maybe everything’s not right.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-tooltip-content">
<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Hi Susan. 
1) Energy supplies are now ... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F20%2Fwhat-is-the-global-public-private-partnership%2F%23comment-442428" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/20/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>
